item.title: Aria2 Rpc
item.description: This article will demonstrate how to develop a download module using aria2 rpc, note that code provided in this article is not a complete application, just to give you some inspiration. tech version electron 30.0.6 webpack 5.91.0 nodejs v20.14.0 aria2 1.37.0 React 18.2.0 react-use-websocket 4.8.1 @mui/x-charts/SparkLineChart 7.3.2 aria2 docs react-use-websocket docs Demonstration of the finished project Package and start aria2 How to integrate aria2 into your project You can either ask your users to install aria2c.
